reviews.review: Bazen iyi vakit geçirdiğimiz, bazen hırs yaptığımız ve çoğunlukla da yapımcı ve rusların geçmişine sövdüğümüz oyun. Zaten biliyosunuz aq.
Muito bom! só precisa aprimorar o vac.
CS GO has been the only game I never uninstalled after loosing interest in it. I still play it once in a while and follow content surrounding it, it's well worth playing and paying for it as I have!
Melhor jogo que já joguei não enjoa e é MT divertido podem baixar que não vão se arrenpender só por favor não usem hack

Great game, have only put a few hours into it so far though.
Good game to play with friends
20 лет игре, изна... кривой даст и капсула с курочками.

Don't subject yourself to this, it's all of the tension and rage that comes with competitive gaming yet none of the reward. 
It just doesn't feel good to play in any way at all, the movement feels clunky and guns are barely controllable for a casual player, it's so strange how I can boot up source, get my ass kicked and have a great time. Yet in this everything just feels so off. I't's a jarring experience that I can barely describe to you, so my only advice is to not play.
Very good game. Sometimes the community is toxic. Other than that, the game is great!
CSGO is Heart Of PC GAming
Preciso jogar um pouco mais pra saber se é ruim ou bom
very good game if you are cheating :)
bon jeu mais eviter les suisse et les russe

This game is very fun but you gotta get good to really enjoy so practice hard, and, whatever you do, DO NOT play casual. Instead, play deathmatch/wargames until you can play competitive.
